full_text: Ben highlights a TE the #Packers have met with in the past month. I know everyone is infatuated with Jelani Woods but here is another day 2 option. https://t.co/Ql8LShxvSp
Also, signing Sammy Watkins wouldn’t alter the #Packers draft in any way, shape, or form.

Injuries have not been kind to Sammy Watkins, who has not played a full season since his rookie year. However, a healthy Watkins would add much-needed speed to the Packers offense. Sprinkling in veterans while adding through the draft is a good way to build a WR room post-Adams.
Rich Bisaccia does not disappoint. I hope this is the start of a new trend. https://t.co/KF5kw5QQKY
Cobb? Overrated? No. Just terrible injury luck. https://t.co/D2UpZauktU
Kind of surprising to look back and see Randall Cobb had only one 1,000-yard season. Goes to show how valuable even a receiver can be without huge numbers.
Anyone else get Dwayne Bowe vibes from Treylon Burks?
Definitely agree after a deeper dive. Kind of top heavy and no clear alpha. https://t.co/8iy0DCvo12
Really liked Enagbare’s tape despite his poor showing at the combine. Still like him as a day two option for the #Packers. https://t.co/y3iVMV9Maw
